poem:
### Screens  

Bright glow of blue,  
unseen walls rise—  
young eyes trapped,  
beneath endless scrolls.  

A world missed,  
in silent clicks—  
mute words,  
our once-breathing voices  
faintly fade.  

Step out,  
beyond the glass veil,  
find the pulse  
of spoken air,  
rediscover  
the warmth of now.
